```lean4
import Mathlib

open Filter Topology Nat

abbrev putnam_1990_b1_solution : Set (ℝ → ℝ) := sorry
-- {fun x : ℝ => (Real.sqrt 1990) * Real.exp x, fun x : ℝ => -(Real.sqrt 1990) * Real.exp x}
/--
Find all real-valued continuously differentiable functions $f$ on the real line such that for all $x$, $(f(x))^2=\int_0^x [(f(t))^2+(f'(t))^2]\,dt+1990$.
-/
theorem putnam_1990_b1
    (P : (ℝ → ℝ) → Prop)
    (P_def : ∀ f, P f ↔ ∀ x,
      (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990)
    (f : ℝ → ℝ) :
    (ContDiff ℝ 1 f ∧ P f) ↔ f ∈ putnam_1990_b1_solution :=
  sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1990_b1
    (P : (ℝ → ℝ) → Prop)
    (P_def : ∀ f, P f ↔ ∀ x,
      (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990)
    (f : ℝ → ℝ) :
    (ContDiff ℝ 1 f ∧ P f) ↔ f ∈ putnam_1990_b1_solution := by
  simp only [putnam_1990_b1_solution, Set.mem_setOf_eq]
  constructor
  · rintro ⟨hf, hP⟩
    have h1 : ∀ x, (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990 := by
      intro x
      exact hP x
    have h2 : f = fun x => Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x ∨ f = fun x => -(Real.sqrt 1990) * Real.exp x := by
      have h3 := h1 0
      have h4 := h1 1
      have h5 := h1 (-1)
      have h6 := h1 2
      have h7 := h1 (-2)
      have h8 := h1 3
      have h9 := h1 (-3)
      norm_num [Real.exp_ne_zero] at h3 h4 h5 h6 h7 h8 h9
      -- Use the above equations to show that f must be one of the two functions
      have h10 : f = fun x => Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x ∨ f = fun x => -(Real.sqrt 1990) * Real.exp x := by
        apply or_iff_not_imp_left.mpr
        intro h
        apply funext
        intro x
        have h11 := h3
        have h12 := h4
        have h13 := h5
        have h14 := h6
        have h15 := h7
        have h16 := h8
        have h17 := h9
        simp [Real.exp_ne_zero] at h11 h12 h13 h14 h15 h16 h17
        <;>
        nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 1990, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 1990 by norm_num)]
      exact h10
    cases h2 with
    | inl h2 =>
      simp_all [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq]
      <;>
      aesop
    | inr h2 =>
      simp_all [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq]
      <;>
      aesop
  · rintro (h | h)
    -- Case 1: f(x) = Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x
    ·
      have h1 : f = fun x => Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x := h
      have h2 : ContDiff ℝ 1 f := by
        rw [h1]
        apply ContDiff.mul
        · exact contDiff_const
        · exact contDiff_exp
      have h3 : ∀ x, (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990 := by
        intro x
        rw [h1]
        simp [Real.exp_ne_zero]
        field_simp [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq, Real.exp_ne_zero, mul_comm]
        <;>
        ring_nf
        <;>
        norm_num
        <;>
        field_simp [Real.exp_ne_zero]
        <;>
        ring_nf
        <;>
        norm_num
        <;>
        field_simp [Real.exp_ne_zero]
        <;>
        linarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 1990]
      exact ⟨h2, by simpa using h3⟩
    -- Case 2: f(x) = -Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x
    ·
      have h1 : f = fun x => -(Real.sqrt 1990) * Real.exp x := h
      have h2 : ContDiff ℝ 1 f := by
        rw [h1]
        apply ContDiff.mul
        · exact contDiff_const
        · exact contDiff_exp
      have h3 : ∀ x, (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990 := by
        intro x
        rw [h1]
        simp [Real.exp_ne_zero]
        field_simp [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq, Real.exp_ne_zero, mul_comm]
        <;>
        ring_nf
        <;>
        norm_num
        <;>
        field_simp [Real.exp_ne_zero]
        <;>
        ring_nf
        <;>
        norm_num
        <;>
        field_simp [Real.exp_ne_zero]
        <;>
        linarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 1990]
      exact ⟨h2, by simpa using h3⟩
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1990_b1
    (P : (ℝ → ℝ) → Prop)
    (P_def : ∀ f, P f ↔ ∀ x,
      (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990)
    (f : ℝ → ℝ) :
    (ContDiff ℝ 1 f ∧ P f) ↔ f ∈ putnam_1990_b1_solution := by
  simp only [putnam_1990_b1_solution, Set.mem_setOf_eq]
  constructor
  · rintro ⟨hf, hP⟩
    have h1 : ∀ x, (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990 := by
      intro x
      exact hP x
    have h2 : f = fun x => Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x ∨ f = fun x => -Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x := by
      have h3 := h1 0
      have h4 := h1 1
      have h5 := h1 (-1)
      have h6 := h1 (1 / 2)
      have h7 := h1 (-1 / 2)
      simp [Real.exp_ne_zero] at h3 h4 h5 h6 h7
      have h8 : f 0 = Real.sqrt 1990 ∨ f 0 = -Real.sqrt 1990 := by
        apply or_iff_not_imp_left.mpr
        intro h
        apply mul_left_cancel₀ (sub_ne_zero_of_ne h)
        nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 1990 by norm_num)]
      cases h8 with
      | inl h8 =>
        have h9 : ∀ x, f x = Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x := by
          intro x
          have h10 := h1 x
          have h11 := h1 0
          have h12 := h1 1
          have h13 := h1 (-1)
          have h14 := h1 (1 / 2)
          have h15 := h1 (-1 / 2)
          simp [h8, Real.exp_ne_zero] at h10 h11 h12 h13 h14 h15
          field_simp [Real.exp_ne_zero] at *
          <;> ring_nf at * <;> nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 1990, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 1990 by norm_num)]
        aesop
      | inr h8 =>
        have h9 : ∀ x, f x = -Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x := by
          intro x
          have h10 := h1 x
          have h11 := h1 0
          have h12 := h1 1
          have h13 := h1 (-1)
          have h14 := h1 (1 / 2)
          have h15 := h1 (-1 / 2)
          simp [h8, Real.exp_ne_zero] at h10 h11 h12 h13 h14 h15
          field_simp [Real.exp_ne_zero] at *
          <;> ring_nf at * <;> nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 1990, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 1990 by norm_num)]
        aesop
    aesop
  · rintro (rfl | rfl) <;>
    constructor <;>
    (try apply ContDiff.mul) <;>
    (try apply ContDiff.neg) <;>
    (try apply ContDiff.const) <;>
    (try apply ContDiff.exp) <;>
    (try apply contDiff_id) <;>
    (try apply contDiff_const) <;>
    (try simp_all [P_def, Real.exp_ne_zero]) <;>
    (try ring_nf) <;>
    (try norm_num) <;>
    (try field_simp [Real.exp_ne_zero]) <;>
    (try norm_num) <;>
    (try linarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 1990, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 1990 by norm_num)]) <;>
    (try aesop) <;>
    (try norm_num)

theorem putnam_1990_b1
    (P : (ℝ → ℝ) → Prop)
    (P_def : ∀ f, P f ↔ ∀ x,
      (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990)
    (f : ℝ → ℝ) :
    (ContDiff ℝ 1 f ∧ P f) ↔ f ∈ putnam_1990_b1_solution := by
  constructor
  · rintro ⟨h, h'⟩
    have h₁ := h' 0
    have h₂ := h' 1
    have h₃ := h' (-1)
    have h₄ := h' (1 / 2)
    have h₅ := h' (-1 / 2)
    simp [P_def] at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅
    have h₆ := h₁
    have h₇ := h₂
    have h₈ := h₃
    have h₉ := h₄
    have h₁₀ := h₅
    -- Normalize the expressions to simplify the equations
    ring_nf at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆ h₇ h₈ h₉ h₁₀
    -- Use the simplified equations to find the solution
    have h₁₁ : f = fun x => Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x ∨ f = fun x => -Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x := by
      apply or_iff_not_imp_left.mpr
      intro h
      have h₁₂ := h₁
      have h₁₃ := h₂
      have h₁₄ := h₃
      have h₁₅ := h₄
      have h₁₆ := h₅
      apply funext
      intro x
      have h₁₇ := h₁₂
      have h₁₈ := h₁₃
      have h₁₉ := h₁₄
      have h₂₀ := h₁₅
      have h₂₁ := h₁₆
      simp_all [Real.exp_ne_zero]
      <;> nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 1990, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 1990 by norm_num)]
    simp_all [putnam_1990_b1_solution]
    <;> aesop
  · rintro hf
    have h₁ := hf
    simp [P_def] at h₁
    have h₂ := h₁ 0
    have h₃ := h₁ 1
    have h₄ := h₁ (-1)
    have h₅ := h₁ (1 / 2)
    have h₆ := h₁ (-1 / 2)
    simp at h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆
    have h₇ : f = fun x => Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x ∨ f = fun x => -Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x := by
      aesop
    cases h₇ with
    | inl h₇ =>
      have h₈ : ContDiff ℝ 1 f := by
        rw [h₇]
        apply ContDiff.mul
        · exact contDiff_const
        · exact contDiff_exp
      exact ⟨h₈, by simp_all [P_def]⟩
    | inr h₇ =>
      have h₈ : ContDiff ℝ 1 f := by
        rw [h₇]
        apply ContDiff.mul
        · exact contDiff_const
        · exact contDiff_exp
      exact ⟨h₈, by simp_all [P_def]⟩

theorem putnam_1990_b1
    (P : (ℝ → ℝ) → Prop)
    (P_def : ∀ f, P f ↔ ∀ x,
      (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990)
    (f : ℝ → ℝ) :
    (ContDiff ℝ 1 f ∧ P f) ↔ f ∈ putnam_1990_b1_solution := by
  constructor
  · rintro ⟨h1, h2⟩
    have h3 : ∀ x, (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990 := by
      intro x
      exact h2 x
    have h4 : f = fun x => Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x ∨ f = fun x => -(Real.sqrt 1990) * Real.exp x := by
      have h5 := h3 0
      have h6 := h3 1
      have h7 := h3 (-1)
      have h8 := h3 2
      have h9 := h3 (-2)
      have h10 := h3 3
      have h11 := h3 (-3)
      simp [P_def] at h5 h6 h7 h8 h9 h10 h11
      have h12 := h3 0
      have h13 := h3 1
      have h14 := h3 (-1)
      have h15 := h3 2
      have h16 := h3 (-2)
      have h17 := h3 3
      have h18 := h3 (-3)
      norm_num at h5 h6 h7 h8 h9 h10 h11 h12 h13 h14 h15 h16 h17 h18
      have h19 : f = fun x => Real.sqrt 1990 * Real.exp x ∨ f = fun x => -(Real.sqrt 1990) * Real.exp x := by
        apply or_iff_not_imp_left.mpr
        intro h
        apply funext
        intro x
        have h20 := h3 x
        have h21 := h3 0
        have h22 := h3 1
        have h23 := h3 (-1)
        have h24 := h3 2
        have h25 := h3 (-2)
        have h26 := h3 3
        have h27 := h3 (-3)
        simp_all [Real.exp_ne_zero, mul_comm]
        <;> nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 1990, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 1990 by norm_num)]
      exact h19
    aesop
  · rintro (h | h) <;>
    constructor
    · -- Show that f is C^1
      apply ContDiff.mul
      · exact contDiff_const
      · exact Real.contDiff_exp
    · -- Verify that f satisfies the given equation
      have h1 := h
      have h2 : ∀ x, (f x) ^ 2 = (∫ t in (0 : ℝ)..x, (f t) ^ 2 + (deriv f t) ^ 2) + 1990 := by
        intro x
        have h3 := h1
        simp_all [Real.exp_ne_zero, mul_comm]
        <;> nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 1990, Real.sq_sqrt (show (0 : ℝ) ≤ 1990 by norm_num)]
      exact h2
